entry.title: nisharga/smart-copy2clip: A lightweight React component that adds a simple copy-to-clipboard button to your app. Supports both strings and numbers. Includes dynamic icon feedback: a copy icon before clicking, and a checkmark icon after successful copy.
entry.content: A lightweight React component that adds a simple copy-to-clipboard button to your app. Supports both strings and numbers. Includes dynamic icon feedback: a copy icon before clicking, and a checkmark icon after successful copy.
